Name: Onion Ring Martini
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE onion in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Certainly one of the most obscure Martini variations - drinkable, but leaves you with onion breath.
History: Reputed to have been created at the Bamboo Bar, Bangkok, Thailand. Also see our Dry Martini page.
